channel.title: Android Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Android Tech Blog

item.description:
Hi, I’m Ashish

I’m an Android developer passionate about building beautiful, performant mobile applications. Welcome to my tech blog where I share my journey, insights, and knowledge about Android development.

My Journey

I started my Android development journey in 2014 and have since worked on multiple apps that have been downloaded by millions of users worldwide. My focus areas include:

  • Android Development: Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, MVVM Architecture,MVP architecture
  • Performance Optimization: Making apps faster and more efficient
  • UI/UX Design: Creating delightful user experiences
  • Modern Android: Material Design 3, Compose, Coroutines, Flow etc

Professional Background

  • Currently working as Senior Software Engineer at Rediff.com
  • 11 years of experience in Android development

What I Write About

On this blog, you’ll find:

Get in Touch

I’d love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.

Contact Information

  • Email: hello@androiddevapps.com
  • X/Twitter: @androiddevapps
  • LinkedIn: androiddevapps
  • GitHub: @exjunk

What I Can Help With

  • Android development questions
  • Technical collaboration
  • Speaking opportunities
  • Guest post submissions
  • General inquiries

Response Time

I typically respond to emails within 24-48 hours on weekdays. For urgent matters, please mention “URGENT” in your subject line.

Last Updated: 5th Nov 2025

Introduction

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Android Tech Blog (“we,” “our,” or “us”) collects, uses, and protects your information when you visit our website.

Information We Collect

Automatically Collected Information

When you visit our blog, we may automatically collect:

  • Log Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, pages viewed, and timestamps
  • Cookies: Small data files stored on your device to enhance your browsing experience
  • Analytics Data: Information about how you interact with our site through analytics services

Information You Provide

We may collect information you voluntarily provide, such as:
